attributes.action: save children's nursing and prevent the introduction of the generic nurse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that this government intervenes with the NMC consultation to ensure the provision of children's nurses for all children and young people in the UK.Childrens nursing must remain to ensure and maintain current standards of excellence in the nursing care of children. We are in opposition to the move towards a "generic nurse" currently being debated  by the Nursing & Midwifery Council.It is impossible to reconcile this generic model with current public policy, expressed by your own government during the last decade, which places the child and family at the centre of service provision.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save children's nursing and prevent the introduction of the generic nurse."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17397


Prime Minister's Office
